snippet.title: Let's Play Bootstrap Island: Learning the Ruthless Survival Sim
snippet.description:
Join me as I journey through the ruthless world of Bootstrap Island in this intense VR survival adventure! Can I uncover the island's secrets or will I become just another lost soul? Stay tuned to find out! 

𝐍𝐎𝐓𝐄𝐒

Get the free Bootstrap Island demo during Steam Next Fest and be sure to wishlist if you enjoy challenging VR survival experiences! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1942110/Bootstrap_Island/

✏️Found this video helpful? Join today to help support this channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbk9LSNjZpsPaSbbBhXF7Kg/join
______________________ 

𝐂𝐎𝐍𝐍𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝐖𝐈𝐓𝐇 𝐌𝐄

🦢Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/atombombbody 
📹TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@atombombbody
👚Merch: https://teespring.com/stores/thebombshop
📸Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atombombody 
☕Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/atombombbody
🎮Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/atombombbody 
📹My Gear: https://kit.co/AtomBombBody

📧Business Inquiries: hello@atombombbody.com

Disclaimer: This is a sponsored video, however all opinions expressed are mine. Some links I share are affiliate links, which means I earn a small commission if you make a purchase. If you choose to use them, thank you for supporting the channel!

______________________ 

𝐀𝐁𝐎𝐔𝐓 𝐌𝐄

I started streaming in 2017 but went full time as a freelancer in 2018, and I specialize in virtual and mixed reality gaming. I enjoy showing off various VR games through my live-streams here on this channel, and I offer tutorials to other aspiring content creators on how they can setup VR for broadcasting and recording.

I also am product marketing over at LIV! https://www.liv.tv/
